import './login.css' import image from './../../../../assests/The Coupon Project Logo.png' import * as Yup from "yup"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; const validationSchema = Yup.object({ email: Yup.string().email('Invalid email format').required('Required'), password: Yup.string().required('Required') }) export default function Login(props) { useEffect(() => { props.setSidebarVisible(false) props.setHeaderVisible(false) }) const handleSubmit = (values, { setFieldValue }) => { //if login is successful if (true) { switch (values.type) { case 'Customer': props.setContent('Customer') break; case 'Company': props.setContent('Company') break; case 'Admin': props.setContent('Admin') break; default: window.location.reload() break; } return } //if login is unsuccessful setFieldValue('password', '') setTimeout(() => { alert("Email or Password are incorrect, try again.") }, 0) }; return (
handleSubmit(values, { setFieldValue })} validationSchema={validationSchema} > {({ isValid, dirty }) => (
)}
) }
